external_games.name: Let's Turn Pick-Up Beach to a Nudist Fucking Beach!

name: Let's Turn Pick-Up Beach to a Nudist Fucking Beach!
summary: You are the owner of "Beach House", a shop run on a pick-up beach. Your goal is to change this pick-up beach into your dream nudist fucking beach where anyone can do lewd things whenever they want to. Spread rumors, hold events, etc, and change the beach's mood to make your dreams come true.
